item.title: Trump says 'existing structure' of White House East Wing to be torn down
item.description: US President Donald Trump previously said that his ballroom addition would not "interfere with the current building".

item.title: Trump says Putin talks 'don't go anywhere' as he imposes new sanctions
item.description: The US has announced new sanctions on Rosneft and Lukoil, Russia's two largest oil companies over continued fighting in Ukraine.

item.title: US forces kill two in strike on alleged drug boat in the Pacific
item.description: This is the eighth US strike on alleged drug trafficking vessels near Latin America, the first on the Pacific side.

item.title: No camera covered Louvre wall where jewel thieves broke in, director says
item.description: Laurence des Cars said there was only one camera pointing on the gallery which was robbed.

item.title: UN's top court says Israel obliged to allow UN aid into Gaza
item.description: The court also says Israel has not substantiated its allegations against the UN agency for Palestinian refugees.
